title: VA - FAX Compilation (1994) [Ambient} [FLAC]
description:
Review by John Bush

The most basic compilation for American audiences interested in Pete Namlook's Fax Records is a two-disc set including tracks from Namlook guises Air, the Putney, 4Voice and Shades of Orion. A host of other Fax favorites make appearances: Plastikman's Richie Hawtin on the epic From Within track "Sad Alliance," Deep Space Network and Dr. Atmo on I.F.'s "Kisy Loa," Atom Heart and Tetsu Inoue on their Datacide track "Data Haku." Fax is easily the most traditional-sounding ambient label, and the music would make an equally strong impression on fans of Hearts of Space and Basic Channel.


CD 1 Tracklist:
01. Sad World - Terasury (written by Dr.Atmo & Ramin)
02. Ambiant Otaku - Holy Dance (written by Tetsu Inoue)
03. From Within - Sad Alliance (written by Pete Namlook & Richie Hawtin)
04. Silence - Heaven (AW-Cut) (written by Pete Namlook & Dr.Atmo)
05. Music For Films - Movement 5 (written by Dr. Atmo & Oliver Lieb)
06. I.F. - Kisy Loa (written by Dr.Atmo & Deep Space Network)
07. 4Voice - 4VI Outro (written by Pete Namlook)

Total time: 01:14:57

CD 2 Tracklist:
01. Zenith - Electro Dreams (written by Tetsu Inoue & Carlos Vivanco)
02. Air - Trip #9 (written by Pete Namlook)
03. Transonic - Time Span Zero (written by Robert Musso)
04. The Putney - Angel Circle (written by Pete Namlook & Ludwig Rehberg)
05. Shades Of Orion - Biotrip (written by Pete Namlook & Tetsu Inoue)
06. DATacide - Data Haiku (written by Atom Heart & Tetsu Inoue)

Total time: 01:10:13
